Requirements.Rt2: Email address included of data collector
Requirements.Rt3: Phone number included of data collector
Requirements.Rt4: Physical address included of data collector
Requirements.Rt5: In policy, a description of of what information is collected of children
Requirements.Rt6: In policy, stating how personal info can be made public by child
Requirements.Rt7: In Policy, state that child's data can be reviewed and deleted, or stopped entirely
Requirements.Rt8: Link or guide on how to accomplish data reviewal or deletion
